title: Redirect the URL's from www2 to www domain keeping the URL's as it is
body: There are ways to redirect in .htaccess to redirect www to non-www version, but i would like to know how to redirect all URL's from www2 to www version keeping the URL's as it is, this has to redirect in bulk and not one-to-one redirect as there are thousand's of URL. Any help is welcome as i have no clue on this.Thank you.
